title: Champ select freeze
body: Recently i've been getting a lot of random freezes during champ select, more specifically it will freeze then say i'm disconnected, then freeze again. i end up with a leaver buster for queues and its kinda frustrating, any insight to why this happens?

replies.body: Typically those freezes in champion select happen due to your connection going into a dormant state for some reason. The best way to prevent that from happening would be to use an ethernet/hardwired connection instead of wifi. If that's not possible at all, try going through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is properly configured. I would pay special attention to the steps on firewalls to make sure those aren't blocking your network!
